main.bio: My name is Niketa. I'm a former Speech Pathologist turned Full Stack ReactJS Developer. I like to build beautiful sites with quality user experiences.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I'm constantly working to master knowledge of the skills I've already developed, while learning new languages and frameworks

education.degree: Masters of Education in Speech and Language Pathology
Bachelors of Arts in Public Relations

work.title: Speech Pathologist
work.description: Designed and implemented appropriate treatment plans of 83 students with language delays, articulation disorders, and autism spectrum disorders in an elementary school of 1K+ students.

projects.title: Your Shake
projects.category: E-commerce site built with Firebase, ReactJS, React Context API, Stripe API, and CSS. UX design by Shane Jenerette

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Niketa Jenerette must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
